column6: In a world populated by the most fearsome thieves, murderers and ne'er-do-wells, there is one who is a HEAD above the rest... Enter, M.O.D.O.K.: The Mental Organism Designed Only for KILLING! Killville's very own Merc with a Maw is open for business! But his next job may be biting off more than he can chew...
column8: | penciller (cover):David Lafuente | artist:Amilcar Pinna | writer:Chris Yost
